home.intro: BⱯBEL RËVOLUㅏION is a monumental project, as rich and diverse as languages themselves. It is both a constantly evolving work, finished creations, and an interactive platform for crafting collaborative stories. This site invites you to dive into a digital writing space where everyone can contribute and co-create, in their own style.
home.emptyMessage: Come on, try to write something!
home.tryDragGraph: Let's try to drag the graph!

exampleGraph.text1: The graph appears with at least four interconnected nodes. Each node holds a title, a gateway to an idea. Observe the whole, feel the connections, and discover the relationships between each thought.
exampleGraph.text2: Click on a node to unveil the details: the author and the content of the message. Each interaction reveals a new step in understanding the exchanges that precede your input.
exampleGraph.text3: By clicking on a node, you can attach your contribution. Write your own message, which will be added to the network, creating a new link or continuing the conversation.
exampleGraph.text4: Grab a node and move it to see the links react. Shift the entire graph, rearrange your view, and play with the gravity that binds thoughts together.
exampleGraph.text5: Use the zoom feature to enlarge or shrink your view of the graph. Whether you want to delve into the details of a specific section or get an overview, it’s up to you to choose the perfect angle.
